english: What subjects are you studying?
I need help with my homework.
arabic: أحتاج إلى مساعدة في واجبي المنزلي.

english: When is the exam?
Can I borrow your notes?
What time does class start?
I forgot my textbook.
Do you have any study tips?
Can you explain this to me?
What is the homework for today?
I need to prepare for my presentation.
Where is the library?
Can you help me with this project?
arabic: هل يمكنك مساعدتي في هذا المشروع؟

english: What did we learn in class today?
Is there a quiz tomorrow?
I need to check my grades.
Can I use a calculator on the test?
arabic: هل يمكنني استخدام الآلة الحاسبة في الاختبار؟

english: What is the deadline for this assignment?
arabic: ما هو الموعد النهائي لهذا الواجب؟

english: Can you proofread my essay?
I need to improve my writing skills.
arabic: أحتاج إلى تحسين مهارات الكتابة الخاصة بي.

english: What are the prerequisites for this course?
arabic: ما هي المتطلبات المسبقة لهذه الدورة؟

english: I have a group study session tonight.
What is the topic of your research?
Can I get extra credit?
arabic: هل يمكنني الحصول على درجات إضافية؟

english: What is the attendance policy?
I need to buy new school supplies.
arabic: أحتاج إلى شراء لوازم مدرسية جديدة.

english: What chapters are included in the exam?
arabic: ما هي الفصول المشمولة في الامتحان؟

english: I need to focus on my studies.
Can I retake the test?
What time is the study group meeting?
I need to sign up for a tutoring session.
arabic: أحتاج إلى التسجيل في جلسة تدريسية.

english: Do you have any study guides?
What is your major?
I need to improve my grades.
Can I ask a question?
What are you studying?
I have a lot of assignments due next week.
arabic: لدي العديد من الواجبات المستحقة الأسبوع المقبل.

english: Can you help me with this math problem?
arabic: هل يمكنك مساعدتي في هذه المسألة الرياضية؟

english: What time is your next class?
I need to take a break from studying.
arabic: أحتاج إلى أخذ استراحة من الدراسة.

english: What books are required for this course?
arabic: ما هي الكتب المطلوبة لهذه الدورة؟

english: Can I join your study group?
arabic: هل يمكنني الانضمام إلى فريق الدراسة الخاص بك؟

english: I need to write a research paper.
